Title: Alps Monogatari: Watashi no Annette
Description: ['12-year-old Annette was born into a poor family in Switzerland. Together with her family she lives in a small village in the Alps. She is a sweet girl and dearly loves her little 5-year-old brother Dani, at whose birth their mother died. She also has a best friend, Lucien. Her wonderful friendship with him comes to a crisis when one day Dani gets injured in a terrible accident.']
Related: ['Summary: Alps Monogatari: Watashi no Annette Specials']
Staff: [['Kusuba, Kouzou', 'Director'], ['Han, Keiko', 'Theme Song Performance'], ["D'Avena, Cristina", 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Aki, Youko', 'Theme Song Lyrics']]
